tr.td: Basic Support encompass what most Open Source projects offer as the only support available. That means mainly through mailing lists and the helpful individuals on those lists. The core developers at DPML also help out as much as they can, trying to balance support with product development, and other tasks required to run the project.

Some of the core developers offers Professional Support of the DPML products for a fee. This support is superior to your average help desk, and each developer will only commit a small number of subscribers, to ensure the high level of support provided. The developer will not only respond to questions and bug reports, but can also implement additional features, provided they are compatible with the Metro, Magic and/or Transit road map.

For longer engagements, some core developers are available as consultants. Availability to these resources varies greatly over time, so please check directly with the developers. You will also find basic information about each developers domain skills on the Professional Consultancy page.
